hooks.command: changed=$(git diff --name-only build.ts example_input.ts init.ts publish.ts test.ts 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$changed" ]; then git checkout -- build.ts example_input.ts init.ts publish.ts test.ts 2>/dev/null; echo "These files are immutable and cannot be changed: build.ts, example_input.ts, init.ts, publish.ts, test.ts"; fi
